(Simplified: 骠)
Chinese Definition:
①驍勇：驃勇。驃騎(中國漢代將軍的名號。亦作“票騎”)。
②馬快跑的樣子。
(Simplified: 骠)

Original meaning 本义: Meaning steed.

English senses 英语理解:

Usage example 用法举例: 黄骠马 huáng biāo mǎ (buff and white horse)

Importance by frequency 常用频率:

Shuowen 说文解字: 黃馬發白色一曰白髦尾也從馬票聲

Compound 驃 from horse (马)馬 mǎ and phonetic fire-warming-hands 票𤐫 piào.

驃字的基本解释

驃
piào

驃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［biāo］
［《廣韻》毗召切，去笑，並。］
“骠1”的繁体字。
黄色有白斑或黄色白鬃尾的马。
[②]［piào］
［《廣韻》毗召切，去笑，並。］
“骠2”的繁体字。
(1)马疾行貌。参见“驃2騎”。
(2)骁勇。参见“驃2悍”。
(3)矫健。参见“驃2壯”、“驃2駿”。
(4)古国名。参见“驃2國”。

驃字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　驃； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1444第22
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?毗召切，音票。【玉篇】驍勇也。　又【說文】黃馬發白色。一曰白髦尾也。　又【集韻】馬行疾貌。　又驃騎，官名。【前漢·武帝紀】驃騎將軍霍去病出隴西。【霍去病傳】作票騎。　又【集韻】?笑切，標去聲。馬黃色。

Basic explanation of words
white horse
piào
white horse
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［biāo］
["Guang Yun", call to cut, laugh, and. ]
"骠1" in traditional characters.
A yellow horse with white spots or a yellow tail with a white mane.
[②]［piào］
["Guang Yun", call to cut, laugh, and. ]
"骠2" in traditional characters.
(1) Horse's appearance. See "Phu 2 Ride".
(2) Be brave. See "Piao 2 Fighting".
(3) Vigorous. See "Pius 2 Zhuang", "Pie 2 Horses".
(4) Ancient country name. See "Pu 2 Country".
white horse
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　骠; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1444 22
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Bi Zhaoqie, sound ticket. [Jade articles] Brave and brave.　[Said Wen] The yellow horse is white. One said the white quill tail is also.　[Jiyun] Horse Xingji Appearance.　You Huqi, official name. [Former Han Dynasty·Wu Di Ji] Huo Qubing, the general of Husband, came out of Longxi. [Huo Qubing Biography] As a ticket to ride.　[Ji Yun] again? Smile and cut, and mark off. Horse yellow.
